oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man respects his mother-in-law's name and does not speak it. His mother-in-law addresses him as 'son-in-law'. When his mother-in-law is silent he is silent. He addresses his wife's father as his =khumm. 1) p.9834v: an explanation of the terms =khumm and |ui sau, which are used for addressing the father- or son-in-law and the mother- and daughter-in-law, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-10.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A man respects his wife's mother
